features: - three white brightness levels for comfortable proximity lighting and rapid movement
- red lighting (continuous or strobe) combines visual comfort and stealth
- single button for quick and easy selection of brightness or light color
- easy to put on using the quick-release buckle on the headband
- HYBRID CONCEPT design: TACTIKKA + comes with three standard batteries and is also compatible with the CORE rechargeable battery
- compatible with mounting accessories that allow the lamp to be attached to any kind of helmet
